languages.text: {n}Как только морок спадает, оглушающая боль пронзает изможденное тело. В глазах темнеет, и тошнота подползает к горлу, а раны, о которых вы успели позабыть, жестоко напоминают о том, что вы еще живы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Как только морок спадает, оглушающая боль пронзает изможденное тело. В глазах темнеет, и тошнота подползает к горлу, а раны, о которых вы успели позабыть, жестоко напоминают о том, что вы еще живы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как только морок спадает, оглушающая боль пронзает изможденное тело. В глазах темнеет, и тошнота подползает к горлу, а раны, о которых вы успели позабыть, жестоко напоминают о том, что вы еще живы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, a staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your eyes and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you have managed to forget about quickly remind that you are still alive.{/n}

{n}After the spell is lifted, a staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your eyes and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you have managed to forget about quickly remind that you are still alive.{/n}

{n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

{n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

{n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}咒语被解除了，剧痛刺入了你的身体，令你踉踉跄跄。你的视线笼罩在黑暗之中，一阵阵恶心感爬上了你的喉咙，但你身上的伤口依然在提醒你——你还活着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}咒语被解除了，剧痛刺入了你的身体，令你踉踉跄跄。你的视线笼罩在黑暗之中，一阵阵恶心感爬上了你的喉咙，但你身上的伤口依然在提醒你——你还活着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}呪文が解けると、よろけるような痛みが身体を襲った。視界が暗くなり、喉の奥から吐き気が催してきたが、忘れかけてきた傷で自分はまだ生きているのだと実感した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}呪文が解けると、よろけるような痛みが身体を襲った。視界が暗くなり、喉の奥から吐き気が催してきたが、忘れかけてきた傷で自分はまだ生きているのだと実感した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando se disipa el hechizo, un dolor abrumador atraviesa tu cuerpo. La oscuridad te ciega y el vómito asciende por tu garganta, pero las heridas que habías conseguido olvidar te recuerdan de que sigues con vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando se disipa el hechizo, un dolor abrumador atraviesa tu cuerpo. La oscuridad te ciega y el vómito asciende por tu garganta, pero las heridas que habías conseguido olvidar te recuerdan de que sigues con vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une fois le sort levé, une terrible douleur se diffuse dans tout votre corps. Vous êtes soudain {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges tandis qu'une nausée vous remonte dans la gorge, mais ces blessures dont vous aviez oublié l'existence vous rappellent que vous êtes bel et bien {mf|vivant|vivante}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fois le sort levé, une terrible douleur se diffuse dans tout votre corps. Vous êtes soudain {mf|pris|prise} de vertiges tandis qu'une nausée vous remonte dans la gorge, mais ces blessures dont vous aviez oublié l'existence vous rappellent que vous êtes bel et bien {mf|vivant|vivante}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem der Zauber aufgehoben ist, rast ein gewaltiger Schmerz durch deinen Körper. Dunkelheit stört deine Sicht, und Übelkeit kriecht deine Kehle empor, doch die Wunden, die du verdrängen konntest, erinnern dich bald daran, dass du noch am Leben bist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem der Zauber aufgehoben ist, rast ein gewaltiger Schmerz durch deinen Körper. Dunkelheit stört deine Sicht, und Übelkeit kriecht deine Kehle empor, doch die Wunden, die du verdrängen konntest, erinnern dich bald daran, dass du noch am Leben bist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Büyünün kalkmasının ardından sarsıcı bir acı, tüm vücudunu kaplıyor. Gözlerin kararıyor ve mide sıvın boğazına kadar geliyor. Unutmayı bir şekilde başardığın yaralar, kısa süre sonra sana hayatta olduğunu hatırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After the spell is lifted, staggering pain pierces your body. Darkness clouds your vision and nausea creeps up your throat, but the wounds you managed to forget soon remind you that you are still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyünün kalkmasının ardından sarsıcı bir acı tüm bedenini kaplıyor. Gözlerin kararıyor ve mide sıvın boğazına kadar geliyor ama unutmayı bir şekilde başardığın yaralar, kısa süre sonra sana hayatta olduğunu hatırlatıyor.{/n}
